title: Arabic Noisy Text Correction
description: This project presents an Arabic spelling correction system built using a sequence-to-sequence transformer model (T5) fine-tuned specifically for noisy text. To train the model, I scraped over 100,000 high-quality articles from the Youm7 news website, which served as clean reference data. I then generated synthetic noisy versions by injecting common spelling and typing errors to simulate real-world mistakes. The final model was trained on this parallel dataset to learn effective correction patterns. The system is deployed as a Streamlit web application and supports multiple input methods: manual text input, text file upload, OCR from images, and speech-to-text from audio recordings. It offers real-time correction output along with an Advanced evaluation metrics including accuracy , character error rate (CER), precision, recall, and F1 score.

title: EGY CHEM HUB
description: EGY CHEM HUB is an online marketplace connecting chemical suppliers with businesses in Egypt and the Middle East. It offers over 1000 chemical products across various industries, allowing companies to browse, request samples, and place bulk orders with discounts. The platform provides detailed product information, safety certifications, and global shipping services to simplify chemical procurement for industrial businesses.

title: Kinder Ride
description: KinderRide is a real-time school transportation tracking system, ensuring safe and monitored journeys for children with live updates for parents and schools.

title: Oral Radiology
description: Oral Radiology is a platform for the Faculty of Dentistry at MSA University where students upload dental radiographs for professors to evaluate and grade, streamlining assessment and feedback.

title: Searching Algorithms Simulator
description: AI Search Algorithm Simulator is a Python-based visualization tool using Tkinter and ttk. It allows users to create search trees and select different algorithms (BFS, DFS, UCS, A*, Greedy). The tool animates the search process, tracks the fringe, and highlights the optimal path.

title: 1945-Airforce Desktop Game
description: 1945-Airforce is a desktop game built using C#. It is a clone of the popular arcade game 1945, where players control a plane to defeat enemy aircraft and bosses.

title: Sushi World
description: Sushi World is a website for a sushi restaurant, allowing customers to browse the menu and explore available dishes.

title: Explore Egypt
description: Explore Egypt is a frontend website showcasing Egypt's top tourist and historical sites. It provides detailed information, images, and travel tips, helping visitors explore the city's rich heritage. Future updates will enhance functionality for a more interactive experience.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy Bird is a clone of the popular mobile game, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
